record.name: Chm Task Transition Review Active Status

rule.conditionDesc: ( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Active" AND current.phase in SavedRecord = "Review")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Active</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Review</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation_set status to "2" (when ( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Active" AND current.phase in SavedRecord = "Review"))
